name: Planetary Defense Kit (some assembly required)
description:
GIANT RED SQUARES ARE ATTACKING EARTH!

Luckily, you just purchase a brand new Planetary Defense Kit (some assembly required).

Use the time between each enemy wave to assemble your kit.

Survive 30 rounds to save earth!

P.S. I ran out of time this week to really put time into this, but I wanted to upload what I had anyway!
